SEARCH
Package org.opt4j.viewer

Class ObjectivesMonitor

java.lang.Object
org.opt4j.viewer.ObjectivesMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
IndividualStateListener
public class ObjectivesMonitor extends Object implements IndividualStateListener
The ObjectivesMonitor informs its listeners about the Objectives of the optimization problem as soon as it is available.
